suggest.spryker/container: Add this module when you want to use the EventDispatcher plugins.
suggest.spryker/event-dispatcher: Add this module when you want to use the EventDispatcher plugins.
suggest.spryker/silex: If you want to use the Monitoring ServiceProvider, please add spryker/silex.
suggest.spryker/symfony: If you want to use the Monitoring ServiceProvider, please add spryker/symfony.
